GV01rvpp_07u:433: īḷenyam | vaḥ | asuram | su-dakṣam | antaḥ | dūtam | rodasī
GV01rvpp_07u:1510: nu | tvām | agne | īmahe | vasiṣṭhāḥ | īśānam | sūno
GV01rvpp_07u:1969: upa-sadyāya | mīḷhuṣe | āsye | juhuta | haviḥ | yaḥ | naḥ | nediṣṭham | āpyam // RV_7,15.1 //
GV01rvpp_07u:1970: yaḥ | pañca | carṣaṇīḥ | abhi | ni-sasāda | dame--dame | kaviḥ | gṛha-patiḥ | yuvā // RV_7,15.2 //
GV01rvpp_07u:2015: ni | tvā | nakṣya | viśpate | dyu-mantam | deva | dhīmahi | su-vīram | agne | āhuta // RV_7,15.7 //
GV01rvpp_07u:2036: agniḥ | rakṣāṃsi | sedhati | śukra-śociḥ | amartyaḥ | śuciḥ | pāvakaḥ | īḍyaḥ // RV_7,15.10 //
GV01rvpp_07u:2074: agne | mahī | naḥ | āyasī | anādhṛṣṭaḥ | nṛ-pītaye | pūḥ | bhava | śata-bhujiḥ // RV_7,15.14 //
GV01rvpp_07u:2075: tvam | naḥ | pāhi | aṃhasaḥ | doṣāvastaḥ | agha-yataḥ | divā | naktam | adābhya // RV_7,15.15 //
GV01rvpp_07u:2271: agne | bhava | su-samidhā | sam-iddhaḥ | uta | barhiḥ | urviyā | vi | stṛṇītām // RV_7,17.1 //
GV01rvpp_07u:2272: uta | dvāraḥ | uśatīḥ | vi | śrayantām | uta | devān | uśataḥ | ā | vaha | iha // RV_7,17.2 //
GV01rvpp_07u:2273: agne | vīhi | haviṣā | yakṣi | devān | su-adhvarā | kṛṇuhi | jāta-vedaḥ // RV_7,17.3 //
GV01rvpp_07u:2274: su-adhvarā | karati | jāta-vedāḥ | yakṣat | devān | amṛtān | piprayat | ca // RV_7,17.4 //
GV01rvpp_07u:2284: tvām | oṃ iti | te | dadhire | havya-vāham | devāsaḥ | agne | ūrjaḥ | ā | napātam // RV_7,17.6 //
GV01rvpp_07u:2285: te | te | devāya | dāśataḥ | syāma | mahaḥ | naḥ | ratnā | vi | dadhaḥ | iyānaḥ // RV_7,17.7 //
GV01rvpp_07u:4356: pra | vaḥ | indrāya | mādanam | hari-aśvāya | gāyata | sakhāyaḥ | soma-pāvne // RV_7,31.1 //
GV01rvpp_07u:4527: rāyaḥ-kāmaḥ | vajra-hastam | su-dakṣiṇam | putraḥ | na | pitaram | huve // RV_7,32.3 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5176: pra | śukrā | etu | devī | manīṣā | asmat | su-taṣṭaḥ | rathaḥ | na | vājī // RV_7,34.1 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5177: viduḥ | pṛthivyāḥ | divaḥ | janitram | śṛṇvanti | āpaḥ | adha | kṣarantīḥ // RV_7,34.2 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5178: āpaḥ | cit | asmai | pinvanta | pṛthvīḥ | vṛtreṣu | śūrāḥ | maṃsante | ugrāḥ // RV_7,34.3 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5179: ā | dhūrṣu | asmai | dadhāta | aśvān | indraḥ | na | vajrī | hiraṇya-bāhuḥ // RV_7,34.4 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5180: abhi | pra | sthāta | aha-iva | yajñam | yātāiva | patman | tmanā | hinota // RV_7,34.5 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5181: tmanā | samat-su | hinota | yajñam | dadhāta | ketum | janāya | vīram // RV_7,34.6 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5182: ut | asya | śuṣmāt | bhānuḥ | na | ārta | bibharti | bhāram | pṛthivī | na | bhūma // RV_7,34.7 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5183: hvayāmi | devān | ayātuḥ | agne | sādhan | ṛtena | dhiyam | dadhāmi // RV_7,34.8 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5184: abhi | vaḥ | devīm | dhiyam | dadhidhvam | pra | vaḥ | deva-trā | vācam | kṛṇudhvam // RV_7,34.9 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5185: ā | caṣṭe | āsām | pāthaḥ | nadīnām | varuṇaḥ | ugraḥ | sahasra-cakṣāḥ // RV_7,34.10 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5188: rājā | rāṣṭrānām | peśaḥ | nadīnām | anuttam | asmai | kṣatram | viśva-āyu // RV_7,34.11 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5189: aviṣṭo iti asmān | viśvāsu | vikṣu | adyum | kṛṇota | śaṃsam | ninitsoḥ // RV_7,34.12 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5190: vi | etu | didyut | dviṣām | aśevā | yuyota | viṣvak | rapaḥ | tanūnām // RV_7,34.13 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5191: avīt | naḥ | agniḥ | havya-at | namaḥ-bhiḥ | preṣṭhaḥ | asmai | adhāyi | stomaḥ // RV_7,34.14 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5192: sa-jūḥ | devebhiḥ | apām | napātam | sakhāyam | kṛdhvam | śivaḥ | naḥ | astu // RV_7,34.15 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5193: ap-jām | ukthaiḥ | ahim | gṛṇīṣe | budhne | nadīnām | rajaḥ-su | sīdan // RV_7,34.16 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5194: mā | naḥ | ahiḥ | budhnyaḥ | riṣe | dhāt | mā | yajñaḥ | asya | sridhat | ṛta-yoḥ // RV_7,34.17 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5195: uta | naḥ | eṣu | nṛṣu | śravaḥ | dhuḥ | pra | rāye | yantu | śardhantaḥ | aryaḥ // RV_7,34.18 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5196: tapanti | śatrum | svaḥ | na | bhūma | mahāsenāsaḥ | amebhiḥ | eṣām // RV_7,34.19 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5197: ā | yat | naḥ | patnīḥ | gamanti | accha | tvaṣṭā | su-pāṇiḥ | dadhātu | vīrān // RV_7,34.20 //
GV01rvpp_07u:5200: prati | naḥ | stomam | tvaṣṭā | juṣeta | syāt | asme iti | aramatiḥ | vasu-yuḥ // RV_7,34.21 //
GV01rvpp_07u:7356: pra | dyāvā | yajñaiḥ | pṛthivī iti | namaḥ-bhiḥ | sa-bādhaḥ | īḷe | bṛhatī iti | yajatreiti | /
GV01rvpp_07u:7467: amīva-hā | vāstoḥ | pate | viśvā | rūpāṇi | āviśan | sakhā | su-śevaḥ | edhi | naḥ // RV_7,55.1 //
GV01rvpp_07u:7570: ke | īm | vi-aktāḥ | naraḥ | sa-nīḷāḥ | rudrasya | maryāḥ | adha | su-aśvāḥ // RV_7,56.1 //
GV01rvpp_07u:7571: nakiḥ | hi | eṣām | janūṃṣi | vede | te | aṅga | vidre | mithaḥ | janitram // RV_7,56.2 //
GV01rvpp_07u:7572: abhi | sva-pūbhiḥ | mithaḥ | vapanta | vāta-svanasaḥ | śyenāḥ | aspṛdhran // RV_7,56.3 //
GV01rvpp_07u:7573: etāni | dhīraḥ | niṇyā | ciketa | pṛśniḥ | yat | ūdhaḥ | mahī | jabhāra // RV_7,56.4 //
GV01rvpp_07u:7574: sā | viṭ | su-vīrā | marut-bhiḥ | astu | sanāt | sahantī | puṣyantī | nṛmṇam // RV_7,56.5 //
GV01rvpp_07u:7575: yāmam | yeṣṭhāḥ | śubhā | śobhiṣṭhāḥ | śriyā | sam-miślāḥ | ojaḥ-bhiḥ | ugrāḥ // RV_7,56.6 //
GV01rvpp_07u:7576: ugram | vaḥ | ojaḥ | sthirā | śavāṃsi | adha | marut-bhiḥ | gaṇaḥ | tuviṣmān // RV_7,56.7 //
GV01rvpp_07u:7586: sanemi | asmat | yuyota | didyum | mā | vaḥ | duḥ-matiḥ | iha | praṇak | naḥ // RV_7,56.9 //
GV01rvpp_07u:7587: priyā | vaḥ | nāma | huve | turāṇām | ā | yat | tṛpat | marutaḥ | vāvaśānāḥ // RV_7,56.10 //
GV01rvpp_07u:7590: su-āyudhāsaḥ | iṣmiṇaḥ | su-niṣkāḥ | uta | svayam | tanvaḥ | śumbhamānāḥ // RV_7,56.11 //
GV01rvpp_07u:8238: sān-tapanāḥ | idam | haviḥ | marutaḥ | tat | jujuṣṭana | yuṣmāka | ūtī | riśādasaḥ // RV_7,59.9 //
GV01rvpp_07u:8249: iha-iha | vaḥ | sva-tavasaḥ | kavayaḥ | sūrya-tvacaḥ | yajñam | marutaḥ | ā | vṛṇe // RV_7,59.11 //
GV01rvpp_07u:9021: pra | mitrayoḥ | varuṇayoḥ | stomaḥ | naḥ | etu | śūṣyaḥ | namasvān | tuvi-jātayoḥ // RV_7,66.1 //
GV01rvpp_07u:9022: yā | dhārayanta | devāḥ | su-dakṣā | dakṣa-pitarā | asuryāya | pra-mahasā // RV_7,66.2 //
GV01rvpp_07u:9023: tā | naḥ | sti-pā | tanū-pā | varuṇa | jaritṝṇām | mitra | sādhayatam | dhiyaḥ // RV_7,66.3 //
GV01rvpp_07u:9024: yat | adya | sūre | ut-ite | anāgāḥ | mitraḥ | aryamā | suvāti | savitā | bhagaḥ // RV_7,66.4 //
GV01rvpp_07u:9039: uta | sva-rājaḥ | aditiḥ | adabdhasya | vratasya | ye | mahaḥ | rājānaḥ | īśate // RV_7,66.6 //
GV01rvpp_07u:9040: prati | vām | sūre | ut-ite | mitram | gṛṇīṣe | varuṇam | aryamaṇam | riśādasam // RV_7,66.7 //
GV01rvpp_07u:9041: rāyā | hiraṇya-yā | matiḥ | iyam | avṛkāya | śavase | iyam | viprā | medha-sātaye // RV_7,66.8 //
GV01rvpp_07u:9160: kāvyebhiḥ | adābhyā | ā | yātam | varuṇa | dyu-mat | mitraḥ | ca | soma-pītaye // RV_7,66.17 //
GV01rvpp_07u:9172: ā | yātam | mitrāvaruṇā | juṣāṇau | āhutim | narā | pātam | somam | ṛta-vṛdhā // RV_7,66.19 //
GV01rvpp_07u:11899: kratvaḥ | samaha | dīnatā | prati-īpam | jagama | śuce | mṛḷa | su-kṣatra | mṛḷaya // RV_7,89.3 //
GV01rvpp_07u:12358: imām | oṃ iti | su | soma-sutim | upa | naḥ | ā | indrāgnī
GV01rvpp_07u:12455: tā | hi | śaśvantaḥ | īḷate | itthā | viprāsaḥ | ūtaye | sa-bādhaḥ | vāja-sātaye // RV_7,94.5 //
GV01rvpp_07u:12496: yat | some | ā | sute | naraḥ | indrāgnī iti | ajohavuḥ | sapti-vantā | saparyavaḥ // RV_7,94.10 //
GV01rvpp_07u:12497: ukthebhiḥ | vṛtra-hantamā | yā | mandānā | cit | ā | girā | āṅgūṣaiḥ | āvivāsataḥ // RV_7,94.11 //
GV01rvpp_07u:12664: janīyantaḥ | nu | agravaḥ | putri-yantaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | sarasvantam | havāmahe // RV_7,96.4 //
GV01rvpp_07u:12810: devī | devasya | rodasī iti | janitrī iti | bṛhaspatim | vāvṛdhatur mahitvā | dakṣāyyāya
GV01rvpp_07u:12811: dakṣatā sakhāyahk karad brahmaṇe sutarāsugādhā // RV_7,97.8 //
GV01rvpp_07u:13366: yaḥ | garbham | oṣadhīnām | gavām | kṛṇoti | arvatām | parjanyaḥ | puruṣīṇām // RV_7,102.2 //
